subtasks: Position自己 to face the speaker/headphones
Move head to change direction of music reception
Tilt head slightly to prevent discomfort
Tap foot/rhythm to the music, if desired

tasks.task: The main task is **MAINTASK: Listen to music while working**. This involves several sub-tasks:
subtasks: Position 自己 to face the speaker/headphones** – Adjusting your body to face the audio source.
Adjust volume to appropriate level** – Ensuring the music is at a suitable decibel for concentration and comfort.
Move head to change direction of music reception** – Tilt or adjust head movements to optimize sound direction.
Tilt head slightly to prevent discomfort** – Ensuring head posture is not strained by prolonged listening.
Tap foot/rhythm to the music, if desired** – Engaging physically with the beat.
Sing or hum along with the music, if desired** – Vocal engagement with the songs.
Use gestures to adjust playback volume or track (if using a device controlled by gestures)** – Interacting with the audio device through physical movements.
Track progression of music through the playlist/song sequence** – Mentally or verbally following the sequence.
Periodically check time or progress of work** – Keeping track of task duration or completion.
